alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Lincoln; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:02AM CDT until June 26 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 702 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Haynesville to near Minden, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Homer, Arcadia, Haynesville, Gibsland, Simsboro, Evergreen, Athens, Lisbon, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon, Leton, Holly Springs, Mount Zion, Aycock, Spring Lake, Sailes, Lake Clairborne, Corinth, Unionville and Ada. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
